query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `progress_records` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `studentId` int NOT NULL,
  `professionalId` int NOT NULL,
  `recordType` enum('observation','evolution','behavior','development','session') NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(256),
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  `sessionDate` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  `attachments` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `progress_records_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `reports` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `studentId` int NOT NULL,
  `professionalId` int NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(256) NOT NULL,
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  `period` varchar(128),
  `reportType` enum('monthly','quarterly','annual','custom') DEFAULT 'monthly',
  `isShared` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `sharedWith` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `reports_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `student_badges` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `studentId` int NOT NULL,
  `badgeId` int NOT NULL,
  `awardedBy` int NOT NULL,
  `earnedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  CONSTRAINT `student_badges_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `notifications` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `type` enum('activity_completed','milestone_reached','attention_needed','progress_update','badge_earned','general') NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(256) NOT NULL,
  `message` text NOT NULL,
  `studentId` int,
  `isRead` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `data` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  CONSTRAINT `notifications_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `llm_history` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `studentId` int,
  `type` enum('activity_sheet','game_suggestion','educational_content','report') NOT NULL,
  `prompt` text NOT NULL,
  `response` text NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  CONSTRAINT `llm_history_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,

  `earnedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  CONSTRAINT `student_badges_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `notifications` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `type` enum('activity_completed','milestone_reached','attention_needed','progress_update','badge_earned','general') NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(256) NOT NULL,
  `message` text NOT NULL,
  `studentId` int,
  `isRead` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `data` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  CONSTRAINT `notifications_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `llm_history` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `studentId` int,
  `type` enum('activity_sheet','game_suggestion','educational_content','report') NOT NULL,
  `prompt` text NOT NULL,
